channel.title: Liberate 718
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][FONT=Cosmic Sans MS][B][U]Liberate[/U][/B][/FONT][/SIZE] [COLOR=maroon][B][U]Introduction[/U][/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=navy]Liberate is a Runescape Private Server that is based of Matrix, but! It has been re-coded into something [U]phenomenal[/U] and something you've never seen before. Like have you seen the hair name "The Brainiac" or "Xenia Braids"? I bet you have not. But enough talking and lets get to buisness, hop on and check out this awsome server for yourself! [/COLOR]
[COLOR=red][B][U]Links[/U][/B][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://near-trinity.net/forum.php"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://near-trinity.net/links/liberate.jar"]Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://near-trinity.net/webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=green][B][U]Stafflist[/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fjUWK8M.png[/img] [B][U][COLOR=red]Owners[/COLOR][/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fjUWK8M.png[/img] [COLOR=red]Nexon[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C3KXqgi.png[/img] [B][U]Co Owners[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C3KXqgi.png[/img] [COLOR=orange]Ravenftw[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PtZFwFd.png[/img] [B][U]Web Developers[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PtZFwFd.png[/img] None
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jreV5z6.gif[/img] [COLOR=yellow][B][U]Administrators[/U][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jreV5z6.gif[/img] [COLOR=red]Explain[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eFRqcww.png[/img] [U][B]Head Moderator[/B][/U]=[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eFRqcww.png[/img] [COLOR=blue]None[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FEVrqdE.png[/img] [COLOR=white][B][U]ING Moderator[/U][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FEVrqdE.png[/img] [COLOR=white]Shawn[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tY19OWP.gif[/img] [COLOR=green][B][U]Forum Moderator[/U][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tY19OWP.gif[/img] [COLOR=green]None[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IQtdkFR.png[/img] [COLOR=teal][B][U]Supporters[/U][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IQtdkFR.png[/img] [COLOR=teal]None[/COLOR]
[B][U]Teleports[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CXeVjmP.png[/img]
[B][U]Dwarf Battlefield + Cannon (Active NPC's that fight 24-7)[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vH4SolB.png[/img]
[B][U]'Rum'-pumped crabs[/U][/B] - Never before seen NPCS + drop brackish blade [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/s7W7IKC.png[/img]
[B][U]Need Killcount To Enter GWD Boss Room[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wFKKTdE.png[/img]
[B][U]Runespan Minigame[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LbUFVbP.png[/img]
[B][U]Dwarf Cannon Quest[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3KyI4q0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YTaReWM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NbuvaM6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z03Ht5X.png[/img]
[B][U]Shops[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XpnsSEc.png[/img]
[B][U]QBD[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TDyrUaK.png[/img]
[B][U]Daggnoth Bosses W/New Drops&Anims[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/crh3XIi.png[/img]
[B][U]Curses/Lunar/Ancients[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PusEfl2.png[/img]
[B][U]Cooks Assistant 100% Working[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HJkjM9x.png[/img]
[B][U]Zombie Minigame[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S9D7XZh.png[/img]
[B][U]Farming W/Timing,Interactions,ALL seeds working[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XUUs6Jk.png[/img]
[B][U]Goblin Diplomacy Quest (100% Like RS)[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TtkPByV.png[/img]
[B][U]Construction, everything you build is interactive[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DOfVRqt.png[/img]
[B][U]The PHOENIX has risen together with hatchlings - kill for rewards![/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oDMLyM2.png[/img]
[B][U]Grotworms are dangerous NPCS, which drops lots of Rune items![/U][/B] [IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/5797/u3ab.png[/img]
[B][U]2013-12-01 To 2013-12-19[/U][/B]
Added Vote Point Shop and reconstructed home Added Dragonbone upgrade kit 100% Cooks' Assistant - Dialogue and all Clicking the quest on quest tab for progression (100% completed!) Spirit Tree Hair dresser in Falador Giant mole added Changed Vote Points into vote tickets! Fixed Construction, everything you build is now interactive New voting system Re-made crystal chest Moved crystal chest to RuneScape spot. (Taverly infront of summoning) Working on Dwarf Cannon now Fixed next glitch in NPCS & dungeons teles. Added better system for wheat picking Dwarf Battlefield is now multi (like runescape) Added Mutated NPCS Drops. Added Mature Grotworm Dwarf Battlefield NPCS now move. Fixed Dwarf Cannon Process for quest interface. Added Bandits, and 'Rum'-pumped crabs to the training list Added Phoenix to Medium Bosses list Removed the barriers in slayer tower so you can enter all of it. Fixed Farming, 100% Working Now[/CENTER]

[COLOR=navy]Liberate is a Runescape Private Server that is based of Matrix, but! It has been re-coded into something [U]phenomenal[/U] and something you’ve never seen before. Like have you seen the hair name “The Brainiac” or “Xenia Braids”?

Added Mutated NPCS Drops.

Added Bandits, and ‘Rum’-pumped crabs to the training list

Removed the barriers in slayer tower so you can enter all of it.
